description:
The Personal Affairs Department (resp. Physical Health Department) of http://anidb.net/ch26309 [Hanaukyou] consists of maids responsible for their master http://anidb.net/ch3381 [Tarou]`s personal needs, and thus are always around him (which includes sleeping in the same bed as him).
The most active members of this departments are identical triplets (http://anidb.net/ch3387 [Ichigo], http://anidb.net/ch3389 [Ringo] and http://anidb.net/ch3388 [Sango] in the http://anidb.net/a54 [original series]; http://anidb.net/ch26330 [Lemon], http://anidb.net/ch26328 [Marron] and http://anidb.net/ch26329 [Melon] in the http://anidb.net/a1555 [La Verite` remake]); at some stage of the story http://anidb.net/ch3386 [Jihiyou Ryuuka] joins this department and soon becomes its leader.
name: Osoba Goyou-tai
